13.title: Step inside our story
13.description:
Our story

We believe in stories. We love to discover unique ones and we are more than eager to help others build some nice stories of their own.
Why? Because we have our strong story behind these past ten years and all the knowledge that came with it.

Everything began with a personal story. Bogdan Herea was born in Romania, but his results in school brought him a scholarship at INSA LYON (L’Institut National des Sciences Appliquées de Lyon) where he studied Computer Engineering. After living and working for 13 years in France, he knew he must come back to Romania. His belief in the power of technology and the development of the IT industry made him start his first entrepreneurial projects.

This is how PitechPlus started in 2006, as an IT services company in Cluj-Napoca, Romania.

300 employees

2016

Our digital start-ups develop further, get recognized, get international prizes.
Younify, a B2B2C product offers an innovative solution for invoice dematerialization.
PARKING+PLUS, B2B2C, with C focus for easing drivers’ lives in a crowded towns.
FastOrder reduces the amount of time that a customer spends waiting to be served in any restaurant or bar, used in Romania and US.

2014

Kindness is the ultimate coolness.
We founded a free school that teaches passionate young people computer programming.
Academy+Plus is a school based on a partnership with the school 42, founded by the telecom magnate Xavier Niel in Paris.
The common aim is to deliver world class programmers and tech entrepreneurs.

2011

We went mobile.
Our first spin-off: Rodeapps, specialized in mobile development. After 4 years, Rodeapps acquired clients in Europe, US, UAE.

2007

World Custom Organization
Our first governmental client that we still work with.
Data and workflow management, Security, Tracking, CMS, Booking, MarketPlace, Remote deployment, Server installation and maintenance.

 

2017

We started our 11th year by strengthening our ecommerce business line and added the MindMagnet agency to the group. They are a company specialising in ecommerce solutions based on the Magento framework.

2014

We expanded by changing the group operational strategy, from only offering services, to offering services and developing products.
Developed a division dealing with more than 25 startup companies that have technology at the core of their business model. A lot of know-how was transferred to our teams this way.

 

2013

Umanlife.com, a start-up co-funded by Bogdan Herea was awarded by Startup Academy in France and by the Community PharmaSuccess with the distinction “Best Pharma Start-up”.

 

Our story

2010

€1.000.000 revenue

Drivy is the first start-up in our portfolio, a Community - Based Car Rental Service that allowed us to develop more on digital marketplaces.

 

2006

Publicis
The Digital Agency in France was our first client that actually started our digital transformation. During these 10 years, our colleagues worked a total of 26602 man days doing e-commerce, loyalty programs, marketplaces, CMS and much more.

 

To innovate is to move forward. To stand still is to disappear.

At PitechPlus, IT is in our DNA. Evolve and create business and digital solutions for our clients worldwide.

15.title: Tư vấn, xây dựng các giải pháp viễn thông và CNTT

36.title: E-ON
36.description:
E.ON Romania is the natural gas and electricity supplier, member of the E.ON Group, that runs one of the world's largest investor-owned electric utility service providers.

The partnership

The partnership started in 2012 with a security upgrade and a refactoring of the existing client portfolio management system. In the following years, several new applications for the management of the key accounts, a back office system, management for the market liberalization measures, mobile app, presentation sites were developed and new features to expand the client portfolio and customer retention. Also, the team was involved in several consultancy projects of IT infrastructure and IT business.

The partnership peaked in 2016 when E.ON’s digital direction became a priority for the company. PitechPlus' commitment to E.ON’s ambitious plans, helped our client to achieve its objectives, after an effort of more than 4000 man days.From technological point of view the platform developed by PitechPlus is a multi-layer distributed architecture that not only integrates external systems such as SAP, document management system or other systems that provide real-time data, but also exposes a secured API layer in order to offer the possibility to be integrated with other applications: E.ON Back Office, E.ON Myline mobile application, Orange Money, Paypoint payment platform, Younify.

  • Software Development Engineer
  • Software QA Engineer
  • Project Manager
  • SCRUM Master
  • Business Analyst
Technical: Symfony | Drupal | .NET | MySQL | Angular JS | HTML
4 years
5-20 engineers
2-4 teams

37.title: Publicis Groupe
37.description:
Publicis Groupe is a French multinational advertising and public relations company, headquartered in Paris, France, one of the "Big Four" agency companies. They provide digital and traditional advertising, media services and marketing services (SAMS) to national and multinational clients.

What did we do

Web Content and E-Commerce Applications
Brand Enriching Mobile Apps
  • Nearshore development
  • Remote deployment
  • Dedicated Teams | Agile SCRUM | Waterfall
Sectors: Luxury, Retail, Hospitality, Media and Advertising

Team Members

  • Software Development Engineer
  • Software QA Engineer
  • Project Manager
  • SCRUM Master
  • Business Analyst
Technical: Symfony | Drupal | .NET | MySQL | Angular JS | HTML
35-40 engineers
7-10 teams

38.title: FDJ
38.description:
Française des Jeux (FDJ) is the operator of France's national lottery games, and the title sponsor of the FDJ cycling team. The name of the company translates as The French Games. The company is owned and operated by the French government.In addition to lottery games, the company also provides online games and sports betting markets, such as football, cycling and track/field.

What did we do

We developed a new tablet and mobile version of their website www.fdj.fr.
We also developed new games and internal products.

Profiles

  • Drupal 7&8, Java Development Engineer
  • Automation QA Engineer
  • Project Manager
Technical: Drupal 7&8 | Angular JS | Java | Couch Database

39.title: J. Walter Thompson Brussels
39.description:
What did we do

PitechPlus and JWT Brussels team up in 2015 offering quality web development for the Belgian sector for the majority of JWT’s Belgian clients. Along the years we’ve developed more than a dozen of websites and online platforms together. During this collaboration PitechPlus was able to assist JWT in offering different clients from Banking to Automotive industry, presentation websites for existing or emerging products or companies, online platforms that strengthen the relationship between companies and final customers, interactive games and engaged users and took relationships to another level.

Technical details

Drupal 8, Symfony and Angular JS development
SEO optimized
Responsive website
Agile SCRUM

40.title: Betfair
40.description:
Betfair is the largest online betting company in the UK and the largest betting exchange platform in the world. Betfair claims to have over 4 million customers (1.1 million active customers).

What did we do

  • Onshore and Nearshore development
  • Remote and Onsite deployment
  • Dedicated Teams | Agile SCRUM
  • Monetary flows: Automated Bug Resolution Process
  • Games Features: Time and Money restrictions
  • Conception of the communication protocol between the platform and the government services
  • Architecture optimization

Team Members

  • SW Development Engineer
  • SW QA Engineer
  • Project Manager
  • SCRUM Master
Technical: Angular JS | Java | Couch Database
45 engineers
5 teams

41.title: World Custom Organization. Organisation Mondiale des Douanes
41.description:
What did we do

We developed Cargo Tracking System in order to facilitate the targeting of suspect cargo vessels by customs officers. It’s based on defined criteria and it allows an improved management of cargo high volume movement.
This tool is used by customs agencies all around the world.

Plus, we developed a web tool that stimulates the cooperation between customs administrations and the private sector in the fight against counterfeited goods.
Whole development cycle, from writing the specifications to the maintenance phase.

Technical details

Special security measures were used: client certificates to connect users, encryption of communication channels between components, data encryption into the data, IP filters, activity monitoring with alerts.

  • Words in image
  • Front-Office: Java 6 Platform, Ftp service, Solr search engine
  • Back-Office: MySQL Server Database
  • Net back-office
  • SQL Server 2008 decoupled office written in GWT (Google Web Toolkit)

43.title: Genealogie
43.description:
Genealogie.com is the largest online genealogy platform in France and one of the top 50000 web sites worldwide with more than 5 million users and nearly 30000 subscribers. The service responds to more than 25000 requests each day.

What did we do

Notrefamille.com, the owner of the platform was interested to improve the response time of the application, to increase the number of subscribers, to create a new GUI in conjunction with several more functionalities.Archives (digitized documents) management, an efficient search engine using Lucene Solr, automatic alerts for newly introduced persons in other users’ genealogical trees. The overall traffic increased by more than 15%.

Profiles

  • .NET development
  • QA Engineer
  • DBA
Technical: ASP.NET, MVC 5, Web API, Windows services,Entity Framework for Object Relation Mapping, SQL Server,MongoDB, ArangoDB,Tables with more than 500 million rows,
Server farm of 40 machines
8 engineers
1 team

44.title: Ariane
44.description:
Ariane is the world leader in self-check solutions for the hospitality market

What did we do

The product for hotel check-in and check-out for Web and Kiosks is suitable for multiple customers with as many as 1000 deployments all over the world. This is a cloud based solution with distributed services on multiple servers - processing or resources, all using Microsoft Azure.

The application offers the possibility for room selection based on guest preferences, multiple online payment options, mobile and physical key cards and customization for each hotel specific needs.

Profiles

  • .NET development
  • QA Engineer
  • DBA
Technical: NET, MVC,MVC Core Web API, Azure, Angular 1 & 2, SOAP & REST web services, ADO.NET
14 engineers
2 teams

46.title: Drivy
46.description:
Drivy (formerly Voiturelib) is known as the leading P2P car sharing platform in France.

What did we do

Drivy is the Airbnb of the cars: it helps regular people put their spare or used cars up for short-term rent in a safe setting.Through a convenient online platform and mobile app users can arrange a rental close to wherever they are.

Technical details

Mobile/online platform consulting concept, development, implementation, and maintenance of Drivy V2.
Users can register, book cars, make payments

51.title: Monoqi
51.description:
A revolutionary wholesale online platform for design brands and buyers.It connects vendors and buyers in the sector of fashion and design.

What did we do

B2C & B2B platform
Create, manage and update orders in one place
Centralise the communication with the partners
Directly negotiate inquiries in one simple interface

Technical details

Key functionalities: Chat, bargaining module, price management, quote request, commissions management, samples request.
Magento 1.7 community edition for the B2C platform.
Scala for the B2B platform

53.title: Ausy
53.description:
A revolutionary wholesale online platform for design brands and buyers.It connects vendors and buyers in the sector of fashion and design.

What did we do

PitechPlus joined forces with Ausy to develop and deliver at highest quality 2 web platforms in the field of insurance and medical care. The platforms are an interactive tool for presenting the current deals and products, offering also the possibility to acquire any of the custom tailored solution or product that a user might need. The multilanguage support of the platforms help the final client target multinational audience, reaching beyond the limit of any border or limitation.

Technical details

Drupal 8 solutions
SEO optimised
Responsive website
Integration of custom web services
Remote development
Dedicated Teams | Agile SCRUM

57.title: Younify
57.description:
Younify is changing the invoice payment process in particular and the digital documents management in general, for you to feel more secure, more relaxed and have plenty of time for your hobbies.

We are all struggling to manage our documents received on so many different channels (mail box, email, document emitter website). Younify is a spinoff of PitechPlus where we make your life easier and simpler.
How we do that? By aggregating all of your digital paperwork in one place, storing it, sorting it and preparing it so you can read, pay or sign right from one environment.
We are a B2B2C company collaborating with banks to propose our products to their own customers via the bank mobile app or web app.

58.title: Parking Plus
58.description:
PARKING+PLUS is a B2B smart parking startup focused on delivering affordable and up-to-date smartphone-based technology for companies in the parking industry. This app unlocks the value of technology providing an ecosystem of web, mobile applications and innovative hardware in order to change the way people build and use parking services in smart cities.

PARKING+PLUS was designed as a single source solution with modular and flexible functionalities that can solve all parking related issues.

The modularity of the platform enables PARKING+PLUS to provide customer tailored solutions for our partners, tackling parking issues with the following flexible modules:

  • Parking space management - provides valuable information about availability, car parking suggestions and GPS guidance, digital mapping of the parking lot or garage.
  • Bookings - offer customers the possibility to reserve and pay for their parking spots in advance.
  • Mobile payment - no need for carrying change in the pockets or worry about the ticket.
  • Pay on foot, Pay and display systems. Customers have the possibility to pay for their parking space with a simple tap on their phone.
  • Secure access management - enter parking garages using your smartphone or hands on the wheel, no need for the parking ticket.
  • Analytics and reports - drive your business based on information that matters for you, provided in real-time
  • Enforcement - use digital technologies to plan enforcement resources and optimize control operations.

59.title: Fastorder
59.description:
The mission of FastOrder is to reduce the amount of time that a customer spends waiting to be served in any restaurant or bar.

What did we do

With the help of a unique QR code placed on each table, the app automatically detects the restaurant and customer's table. By accessing the menu they can send the order directly from their smartphone so the waiter will know exactly what to bring and where.

FastOrder is a startup that caught value in the company of PitechPlus. By aggregating new ideas, new dreams, and new people who actually believe in their power to be the change for this industry.

The app is very easy to use, and the level of interactivity between the client and the restaurant is very high.

62.title: FrontEnd Developer (CJ and MS)
62.description:
FrontEnd Developer (Cluj-Napoca and Targu-Mures)

Location

  • Cluj-Napoca
  • Targu-Mures

Responsibilities

  • Develop functional and appealing web applications based on established specifications, wire-frames and guidelines;
  • Assist back-end developers in coding and troubleshooting;
  • Research and evaluate new technologies/services that can improve our websites’ performance or user experiences;
  • Participate in knowledge sharing sessions.

Requirements

  • 1+ years of experience in front-end development;
  • Good knowledge of HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, JavaScript;
  • Work experience with front-end frameworks and tools;
  • Knowledge of principles for usability and interaction design;
  • Familiarity with version control systems (Git);
  • Knowledge of responsive design;
  • Attention to design details and overall product quality.

Would be a plus

  • Experience with any of the following JavaScript frameworks: Angular JS, ExtJS, Knockout, Node JS, Backbone;
  • experience working with CSS Pre-Processors (LESS / Sass);

Benefits

  • Modern office space, IT support
  • Professional development through trainings
  • Defined career path
  • Flexible schedule
  • Friendly atmosphere
  • Paid medical services
  • Company sponsored events: teambuilding, sport activities, parties

63.description:
.NET Developer (Cluj-Napoca)

We are looking for Mid Level/Senior ASP.NET MVC Developers for web application and web portal developments with great skills in MVC 4/5/6,ASP.NET Web Api, C#, AngularJS/JQuery.
He should be a highly motivated person with passion for programming.

  • Develop and implement web applications using .NET tools and technologies
  • Verify software functionality both in your own test environment as well as in conjunction with the rest of the project team and test engineers
  • Collaborate with the project team to achieve team goals
  • Follow PitechPlus standards for .NET development in delivering high-quality software

Requirements

  • Strong knowledge of C#,ASP.NET MVC and WebApi, LINQ, SQL-Server and REST API;

  • Good Knowledge of Bootstrap;
  • Good Knowledge of Entity Framework;

Would be a plus

  • Knowledge of MVVM based Frameworks like AngularJS
  • Knowledge of JavaScript, JQuery and AJAX

We will compensate your achievements and commitment with:

  • Modern office space, IT support
  • Professional development through trainings
  • Defined career path
  • Flexible schedule
  • Friendly atmosphere
  • Paid medical services
  • Company sponsored events: teambuilding, sport activities, parties

Magento Developer (Cluj-Napoca)

  • Extend Magento Community and Enterprise functionality for custom business needs

66.title: Business Analyst (CJ)
66.description:
Business Analyst (Cluj-Napoca)

Location

  • Cluj-Napoca

Responsibilities

  • Identify PitechPlus customer needs and recommend viable solutions for meeting those needs
  • Define the BA approach and plan for the completion of the requirements-related activities necessary to meet the needs of the project

Benefits

PHP Developer (Cluj-Napoca and Targu-Mures)

69.title: Project Manager (CJ)
69.description:
Project Manager (Cluj-Napoca)

You will be the key link between our clients, development teams and the rest of the organization and you will also be the central force in driving the projects forward.

Location

  • Cluj-Napoca

Responsibilities:

  • Work and communicate directly with clients
  • Work very closely with the team leads and technical experts in order to determine requirements, identify risks and come up with solutions to client requests
  • Work closely with clients or business analysts to capture functional and nonfunctional requirements
  • Ensure the project is delivered on time and achieving the business and project objectives
  • Manage the work backlog to provide a clear goal for the development team
  • Coordinate all project related meetings and ceremonies
  • Know or be willing to learn how to use tools, such as Gantter, Jira, Confluence, Balsamiq, etc.
  • Understand from a strategic perspective: why you should do a project, what it will look like and how it will work

General requirements

You will need to:

  • Be aware that Software Development is a team game for us, good leadership and people skills are mandatory
  • Be aware (and committed) that the job requires continuous learning
  • Understand the roles of the peers/colleagues that you will be interacting with, and be aware of the multiple perspectives when thinking of solutions
  • Have experience working on fast paced projects and have a firm grip on scope changes and impact
  • Have at least 1 year of IT Project Management experience
  • Work experience in Agile project management within the IT industry
  • Be able to switch context and handle multiple projects at a time
  • Be a good negotiator
  • Have a problem solving attitude in difficult situations
  • Be able to identify improvements to the development and delivery processes
  • Be able to handle conflicts
  • Be highly organized
  • Have good communication skills (written and verbal) – English is a must, French is a great plus

Specific requirements

Overall Project management activities:

  • Project planning
  • Team coordination
  • Stakeholder management
  • Scope management
  • Risk management
  • Cost management
  • Project tracking and reporting
  • Project closing

Benefits

  • Ability to directly influence the outcome, look and feel of projects
  • Internal and external trainings
  • Career development opportunities
  • Part of a growing and developing community of Project Managers
  • You will be able to directly influence processes, tools and will receive support from members of the community
  • Your opinions and suggestions are heard, noted, prioritized and actions are taken upon them if they bring value and improvements
  • Flexible schedule
  • Friendly atmosphere
  • Paid medical services
  • Company sponsored events: teambuilding, sport activities, parties

72.title: .NET Summer Internship (MS)
72.description:
.NET Summer Internship (MS)

Duration:

  • 10 weeks

Where:

  • Targu Mures

Subscribe to our program if:

  • You are a student or graduate of a Computer Science faculty or related IT field
  • You have a strong interest in the field and want to turn that into a career
  • You are willing to commit to a period which will involve a lot of reading/learning and practical challenges

By the end of the internship you will have:

  • A good understanding of Object-Oriented Programming in general
  • Seen and applied frequently used arhitectural types and design patterns
  • A taste of what working in an engineering team means and seen the complete software development life cycle

At the end of the internship, you will have the opportunity to join our team!
Come and evolve with us

82.title: Java
82.description:
Java

The Java community counts more than 30 members in our Cluj office and plans to develop a team in Targu-Mures as well. It’s one of the oldest communities, founded in 2008, with an average experience of 6 to 8 years.

Since the beginning they remained modest, but selective, hard-working, passionate about what they do and really efficient.

Certifications in their field are not necessary, they have good people that are always interested in furthering their knowledge and exploring this language.

It's the community known for their weekly Thursday work-pizza meetings. Sounds yummy and fun, right?

83.title: .NET
83.description:
.NET

This community is all about big numbers and history, counting 31 heads. The 2017 plan is to reach 50 members, by the end of the year.

Their growth is organic, based on 7 internal trainings (C# basic, MVC, Angular JS, React, Umbraco, Sitecore, MSQL), monthly feedback reports and semestrial strategy meetings, as well as a high level of communication and flexibility. When they say flexibility, they mean it. They have colleagues who work from Paris, and go as far as Vietnam. There are 10 MSDN certified developers and a Microsoft Gold Partner title in their portfolio.

All members adopt a long term strategy based on business understanding and business ownership.

84.title: Drupal
84.description:
Drupal

The awesome Drupal team developed a different kind of DNA. And they love it. They’re very passionate about this framework, and embraced the latest version. Their plan is to integrate Drupal 8 in all upcoming projects.

Two important tasks are participating in conferences and workshops around the world, like DrupalCon, to which our boys went four years in a row, and attending weekly meetings with the Drupal Community in Cluj-Napoca. They try to pass on this passion by organizing DrupalCamps for newbies.

It’s a rather big community, in search of expansion, having 23 members with an average age of 23 years old. Three of them are ACQUIA certified, so...

“My team spends every day at the office learning something new, figuring out how to develop as programmers and enjoy every little findings behind the dashboards of Drupal.”

85.title: Symfony
85.description:
Symfony

The Symfony Community is a growing family with more than 30 members in both our Cluj-Napoca and Târgu-Mureș offices.

This is a really young and vibrant community with an average age of 23 years old.

Working with the latest technologies makes them more involved, curious, and flexible, basing their methodologies on the project’s specific needs - from Kanban workflows on smaller scale projects, to full SCRUM implementations on larger teams and projects.

They have 2 certified Symfony developers on board and they’re searching for more.

86.title: Ruby
86.description:
Ruby

They like to call themselves inventive, test-driven developers. Working with a new method based on AGILE, they benefit from changing practices by deploying new technologies and developing innovative working environments.

Their core value is proactivity, driven by creativity.

The team has 12 members, with an average age of 26 years old and four bad-ass chicks. They support the Rails Girls community, organizing and hosting two-day workshops for other girls, passionate about the magical world of Ruby on Rails.

The Ruby community mostly works on e-commerce projects and start-ups, which gives them the opportunity to be innovative and solve problems on the go. One of their future goals is helping some members to become DevOps.

87.title: FrontEnd
87.description:
FrontEnd

This team isn’t really about modesty, and that’s a good thing. The front-end community works as a binder for all of PitechPlus’ communities.

They are juggling with 15 projects a day. And that’s only 80% of their time. The other 20%, they just go crazy with their ideas. This is how they developed 2 start-ups.

It’s a young, ever-growing team, always in search for new ideas and connected to the latest technologies (like JavaScript), with an average age of 23 and 2 to 3 years of experience.

The team leaders are looking for overachievers that are not afraid to solve problems the hard way. They found 5 of these in the last year only.

“For the next 4 years, our plan is to double this number and establish a Design department. Everyone has their homework in Photoshop and there’s a monthly contest challenging their coding and FrontEnd techniques.”

Working with start-ups triggers their creativity and problem-solving skills, building from concept to design and UX, all based on market research.

88.title: QA
88.description:
QA

The QA team is all about curious and tech-passionate people. This community has 25 members in Cluj-Napoca and 4 in Târgu-Mures.

Most of them started as juniors and grew together, while working on every project PitechPlus has had in their portfolio.

They care about quality, solving problems, and their main interest is being efficient, using multiple technologies and covering both web and mobile, as well as small start-ups and enterprise businesses.

They aim the highest, try the hardest, work the longest, go the farthest, until the job is done and the product is in its greatest shape.

92.title: ACADEMY+PLUS
92.description:
ACADEMY+PLUS is the first alternative, tuition-free, peer-to-peer programming school in Romania. The concept and the platform the students are learning on is designed by our partners Ecole 42, in Paris.

There are no classes, no teachers and no tuition fee, open 24/7. The students learn how to filter, compare and use relevant data in order to solve problems and build relevant projects. The most unusual thing about this school is the Pool - an intense 4-week preselection during which the candidates are challenged to solve programming problems with strict deadlines.
Besides the school, the staff organizes coding contests for highschool students - Game of Codes, Hackathons for students and get involved in many events in this field.

95.title: CFAC - Club Francophone d'Affaires de Cluj

111.title: QA Engineer (CJ)
111.description:
QA Engineer (Cluj-Napoca)

You will work in a mixed technologies team with the purpose of delivering high quality software products.

Location

  • Cluj-Napoca

Your main responsibilities will be:

  • Implement QA processes
  • Evaluate the quality of web applications
  • Analyze requirements and specifications documentation
  • Perform functional and non-functional testing
  • Report problems and failures
  • Prepare test documentation

In order to join us, you will need to be able to demonstrate the following attributes:

  • Experienced tester with good Software Development Life Cycle and Quality Assurance processes knowledge
  • Attention to details, team oriented, analytical thinking
  • Problem solving attitude
  • Good organizational and communication skills
  • Fluent in English, both spoken and written

In exchange of your commitment, knowledge and expertise:

  • You will be part of a QA team that will continuously support your evolution and development as a QA engineer
  • You will work with a flexible schedule in a friendly atmosphere

Other benefits:

  • Modern office space, IT support
  • Professional development through trainings
  • Defined career path
  • Paid medical services
  • Company sponsored events: teambuilding, sport activities, parties

138.title: DevOps Engineer (CJ)
138.description:
DevOps Engineer (Cluj-Napoca)

You will be part of an Agile team responsible with projects deployment, configuration and maintenance on elastic (cloud) resources.
We care about the quality of our work while fostering a great teamwork culture.
We also believe in our ability to learn and improve ourselves.

Location

  • Cluj-Napoca

Responsibilities:

  • Support the project continuous build, integration and delivery processes
  • Assist the development team to build and scale the application’s infrastructure
  • Proactively assure smooth running of all systems used by the projects such as application and database servers
  • Solve and maintain logging, monitoring and alerting tasks into an automatic manner
  • Responsible for: technical investigation and analysis of incidents, problem replication, fault diagnosis, performance and reliability problems

Requirements:

  • Mastery of Linux related technologies
  • Experience in scripting (Shell, Python, Ruby etc.) – Linux
  • Experience with container /Docker technologies
  • Knowledge configuration and deployment automation (Ansible, Chef)

Additional Skills:

  • Problem solver attitude, with strong analytical skills and willingness to take ownership
  • Ability to communicate effectively
  • Ability to adapt to changes and to handle multiple priorities
  • Team player
  • Knowledge of the full software lifecycle
  • Experience in working with Scrum/Kanban methodologies

Benefits:

  • Modern office space, IT support
  • Professional development through trainings, workshops
  • Openness for choosing a desired career path
  • Flexible schedule
  • Friendly atmosphere
  • Paid medical services
  • Company sponsored events: teambuilding, sport activities, parties

139.title: Sales Executive (CJ)
139.description:
Sales Executive (Cluj-Napoca)

Location

  • Cluj-Napoca, with frequent international trips (mainly Europe)

Responsibilities:

  • Develop the company's actual network of potential customers
  • Define strategic plans to gain access to new prospects
  • Participate to events and specialised conferences to represent the company and do lead generation
  • Develop your own strong network of contacts, create new relationships in PitechPlus targeted markets with senior executives
  • Develop partnerships with potential lead generators or facilitators
  • Qualify the leads to become potential projects. You’ll work with clients to position our offerings and achieve joint success. Your success will set the stage for long-term client relationships built on trust and real business value
  • Understand the prospects business strategy and development projects, and help them define the right technological tools
  • Understand the prospect’s structure and decision making process
  • Work closely with the business and technical teams for building the commercial offers

Requirements:

  • Proven working experience of at least 3 years in sales in the IT sector
  • Education: Bachelor's Degree
  • Proficiency in English and French is mandatory (B2-C1 level)
  • Solid communication (written, verbal, visual) and interpersonal skills. You’ll need to be relentless at opening new doors
  • High degree of self-motivation and ambition with a results-driven approach
  • Technical background is a plus

What we offer:

  • Motivating salary pack: fixed + uncapped variable + benefits (health insurance, sport participation etc.)
  • Young, dynamic, joyful and professional team
  • Autonomy in work schedule. Your work is measured by KPIs
  • We encourage performance and will help you grow and develop yours skills
  • Exciting career development options in our company
